name: Red
description: Red is the colour of energy, passion and action
It stimulates physical energy and courage

name: Orange
description: Orange combines the energy of red and the happiness of yellow
It encourages social interaction and adventure

name: Yellow
description: Yellow is the colour of the mind and intellect
It inspires original thought and curiosity

name: Green
description: Green is the colour of balance and harmony
It renews and restores depleted energy

name: Blue
description: Blue is the colour of trust, loyalty and wisdom
It has a calming effect and aids concentration

name: Indigo
description: Indigo is the colour of intuition and perception
It promotes deep concentration and spiritual awareness

name: Purple
description: Purple combines the stability of blue and the energy of red
It symbolizes creativity, mystery and spiritual awareness

name: Turquoise
description: Turquoise balances emotions and promotes inner calm
It aids clarity of thought and communication

name: Pink
description: Pink is the colour of unconditional love and nurturing
It soothes emotional energies and promotes affection

name: Magenta/Fuchsia
description: Magenta is a colour of emotional balance and harmony
It combines practical energy with spiritual insight

name: Brown
description: Brown is the colour of stability and reliability
It promotes security, comfort and grounding

name: Gray
description: Gray is the colour of compromise and neutrality
It provides a sense of control and calm

name: Black
description: Black is the colour of power and sophistication
It represents control, authority and independence

name: White
description: White is the colour of purity and innocence
It offers clarity, peace and new beginnings

name: Silver
description: Silver is associated with feminine energy and intuition
It reflects clarity, vision and modern sophistication

name: Gold
description: Gold is the colour of success, achievement and abundance
It symbolizes prestige, luxury and prosperity

name: Maroon
description: Maroon is a dark bluish red denoting controlled and thoughtful action
It is softer than burgundy and less dramatic than true red

name: Burgundy
description: Burgundy is a dark purplish red symbolizing controlled power and ambition
It is sophisticated, serious, and favored by the wealthy

name: Crimson
description: Crimson has a little blue, indicating determination without upsetting others
It exudes sensuality rather than sexuality

name: Scarlet
description: Scarlet has a hint of orange, giving richness, brightness, and enthusiasm
It is less intense, more fun-loving, and tempered with defiance

name: Peach
description: Peach encourages great communication and conversation
It inspires good manners and puts people at ease

name: Golden Orange
description: Golden Orange encourages vitality and self-control
It promotes balanced energy and focus

name: Amber
description: Amber helps to inspire greater confidence and better self esteem
It can promote a degree of arrogance

name: Burnt Orange
description: Burnt Orange emits pride, tension and aggressive self-assertion
It carries a negative vibration

name: Dark Orange
description: Dark Orange indicates over-confidence and over-ambition
It represents the opportunist with a chip on shoulder

name: Light Clear Yellow
description: Light Clear Yellow clears mental fog and boosts alertness
It encourages clarity and openness to new ideas

name: Lemon Yellow
description: Lemon Yellow promotes self-reliance and structured living
It increases sensitivity to criticism and precision in thought

name: Citrine Yellow
description: Citrine Yellow encourages unstable emotions and surface-level attraction
It relates to avoidance of responsibility and emotional teasing

name: Golden Yellow
description: Golden Yellow reflects curiosity and deep investigation
It is sensitive to critique and tends to favor solitude

name: Cream
description: Cream encourages gentle creativity and soft new ideas
It may reflect a lack of confidence and desire for support

name: Dark Yellow
description: Dark Yellow suggests melancholy, pessimism, and self-doubt
It is tied to chronic complaining and emotional heaviness

name: Pale Green
description: Pale Green suggests youth, inexperience, and new beginnings
It allows fresh perspectives and personal growth

name: Emerald
description: Emerald symbolises abundance, vitality, and success
It is emotionally uplifting and creatively energizing

name: Jade
description: Jade represents trust, diplomacy, and spiritual insight
It encourages generosity and deeper understanding

name: Lime Green
description: Lime Green symbolizes playfulness, freshness, and youth
It clears negativity and inspires mental clarity

name: Dark Green
description: Dark Green conveys ambition, wealth, and seriousness
To some, it may also reflect possessiveness or resentment

name: Aquamarine
description: Aquamarine soothes emotional tension and calms the spirit
It provides healing and emotional clarity

name: Olive
description: Olive is associated with peace and diplomacy
It may indicate stubbornness, blame, or deceit

name: Yellow Green
description: Yellow Green represents fear, cowardice, and inner conflict
It may suggest one to be emotionally unstable when unbalanced

name: Grass (Lawn) Green
description: Lawn Green symbolizes abundance, vitality, and growth
It evokes confidence, health, and connection to nature

name: Pale Blue
description: Pale blue inspires creativity
It conveys the freedom to break free

name: Sky Blue
description: Sky blue inspires selfless love and fidelity
It is non-threatening and promotes a helpful nature that can over come all obstacles

name: Navy Blue
description: Navy blue is strong and reliable
It denotes authority and trust

name: Azure Blue
description: Azure Blue inspires true contentment, determination, and ambition.
It instills a sense of purpose in striving for goals

name: Royal Blue
description: Royal blue conveys richness and importance
It is elegant and sophisticated

name: Powder Blue
description: Powder blue is gentle and calming
It can evoke nostalgia and softness

name: Dark Blue
description: Dark blue may repress emotions, appearing cool but deep-feeling.
It represents knowledge, power, and integrity - the color of conservatism and responsibility

name: Dark Indigo
description: Dark indigo suggests depth and sophistication
It is mysterious and powerful

name: Indigo Blue
description: Indigo blue combines calm blue with mystical purple
It is thoughtful and introspective

name: Lavender
description: Lavendar suggests an attraction to the beautiful things
It conveys fragility, sensitivity, and vulnerability

name: Lilac
description: Lilac implies immaturity, superficiality, youthfulness, extroverted, and enthusiastic.
It inspires glamour, romance, and vanity.

name: Mauve
description: Mauve promotes the best choices and decisions; a colour concerned for justice
It may also convey a degree of commonness and social aspiring to higher ideals

name: Amethyst
description: Amethyst opens itself to intuitive channels, a color of the evolved soul
Protects the vulnerable and assists the humanitarian

name: Plum
description: Plum is honourable and linked to family traditions
To some, it can be prudish and narrow-minded

name: Deep Purple
description: Dark purple relates to higher spiritual attainment
Powerful, can indicate arrogance and ruthlessness

name: Aqua
description: Aqua is refreshing and uplifting
It is creative and light-hearted, yet strong and individual

name: Teal
description: Teal signifies trustworthiness and reliability
It promotes spiritual advancement and commitment

name: Blush
description: Blush is similar to skin color and has sensual and sexual connotations.
It is non-threatening but lacks passion and energy.

name: Salmon Pink
description: Salmon pink has a touch of orange.
It encourages the flirt and can be a sign of the timid lover, all talk and no play.

name: Baby Pink
description: Baby pink is soft and gentle
It suggests innocence and sweetness

name: Hot Pink
description: Hot pink is vibrant and energetic
It conveys passion and playfulness

name: Rose
description: Rose is romantic and elegant
It evokes maturity, femininity, and intuition

name: Orchid
description: Orchid is soft and elegant, yet unconventional
It suggests charm and mystery - a non-conformist

name: Light Brown
description: Light brown is friendly and approachable
It is sincere, honest, and genuine

name: Dark Brown
description: Dark brown is strong yet sad and depressive
It is materialistic yet prudent

name: Beige
description: Beige is practical and reliable
It is conservative, constant, unchanging, and loyal

name: Tan
description: Tan is light and natural
It suggests simplicity and calmness

name: Chocolate
description: Chocolate is rich and warm
It evokes comfort and security

name: Umber
description: Umber is dark and earthy
It suggests strength and reliability

name: Light Gray
description: Light gray is soft and neutral
It suggests calmness and balance

name: Slate Gray
description: Slate gray is strong and serious
It evokes professionalism and formality

name: Charcoal Gray
description: Charcoal gray is deep and sophisticated
It suggests power and elegance

name: Jet Black
description: Jet black is pure and intense
It suggests strength and formality

name: Charcoal Black
description: Charcoal black is softer and muted
It conveys seriousness and depth

name: Snow
description: Snow is a bright, clean white with a hint of coolness
It symbolizes purity, freshness, and clarity

name: Pearl
description: Pearl is a soft off-white with subtle shimmer and elegance
It conveys refinement, delicacy, and quiet luxury

name: Ivory
description: Ivory is calming, yet encouraging
It has a reserved style of simple sophistication

name: Alabaster
description: Alabaster is a gentle, warm white with a hint of beige
It feels comforting, pure, and timeless

name: Light Silver
description: Light silver is bright and reflective
It suggests clarity and innovation

name: Dark Silver
description: Dark silver is rich and elegant
It conveys sophistication and depth

name: Light Gold
description: Light gold is bright and radiant
It suggests positivity and wealth

name: Dark Gold
description: Dark gold is deep and rich
It conveys luxury and sophistication
